title: Single Family House in Yonkers near Tuckahoe Avenue
posting_body: ['OPEN HOUSE for this RENTAL House: Tuesday August 2 and Wednesday August 3 between noon and 7 pm.', 'Come tour this house and decide if it works for you!', 'Bright, full of sunshine, comfortable house in Northeast Yonkers, east of the Sprain, just north of Tuckahoe Avenue, just south of Bronxville Heights, and about 0.6 miles to the UPS facility on Tuckahoe Road.', 'The house is convenient to the train at Tuckahoe.', 'Upstairs master bedroom completely updated from ceiling to floor with new ceiling fan, freshly painted ceiling and wall and new flooring.', 'Other two upstairs bedrooms have freshly painted walls and hardwood floors.', 'There is an extra small room adjoining the master bedroom.', 'On the main floor there are a large living room with large bay window, a modern kitchen with newer stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave above stove, the gas stove being a higher end model, a very large dining room with freshly painted walls, hardwood floor, large window and cupboard, a family room with patio door and parquet flooring, and a small adjoining office.', 'The family room can be used as a main floor bedroom with a large walk-in closet.', 'The cement stamped patio is large, recently pressure washed, and ready for your outdoor entertainment.', 'Half of the walk-out basement is finished as an entertainment room, and the other half is a storage/shop area and the laundry room.', 'The washer and dryer stay and are in good condition.', 'All curtains are completely cleaned and stay with the rental.', 'Amenities include: central air, central heat and more.', 'As noted the stove is gas is a higher end model, see picture, which also shows an adjacent spice/seasoning pull out cabinet.', 'Nice back yard, with the large patio, also has a small storage shed, and a Mandarin melon berry fruit tree which is bearing fruit this year.', 'Parts of lawn can be converted to a vegetable garden having lots of sun.', 'Looking for a tenant with good or better credit and employment history.', '$4,250/month rent unfurnished with 12 month lease.', "Security deposit and last month's rent required.", 'Also can furnish and provide as an executive rental, inquire about details.', 'Available on or after August 5, 2022.', 'Sorry, no dogs or cats and no smoking.']
